abstract: Timothy J. Sloan, 53, is leaving the C.F.O. post to head Wells Fargo’s wholesale banking group, and John R. Shrewsberry, 48, currently head of Wells Fargo Securities,will become the new chief financial officer.
snippet: Timothy J. Sloan, 53, is leaving the C.F.O. post to head Wells Fargo’s wholesale banking group, and John R. Shrewsberry, 48, currently head of Wells Fargo Securities,will become the new chief financial officer.
lead_paragraph: Wells Fargo reshuffled some its top executives on Tuesday, naming a new chief financial officer and a new head of wholesale banking.
